column4: I have no idea wth that means file exist. You should be able to delete a directory with rm -rf

well as i have now learnt those files are ones which have been deleted but are still in use by a program. apparently fuse doesn't hide these from the user. lsof to find out which program then closing and restarting it has fixed the issue
it seems the deluge web interface has a bug where it didn't close the file
